message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with natural language processing and word embeddings. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also likely as the paper proposes a deep neural network for specialisation. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is relevant as the paper deals with improving the vector representations of words using external knowledge. 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is relevant as the paper proposes a neural network-based approach. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is less likely but still possible as the paper evaluates the proposed approach on downstream tasks such as dialogue state tracking and lexical text simplification.
